            <!DOCTYPE html>

                    <!--Javascript functions-->
                    <script type="text/javascript">
                        //Global variables
                        var map;

                        var shipIconHijacked
                        var data = null;
                        var timestepData;
                        var numVessels;

                        var currentTimeStep;

                        //Initialization function called when the form is loaded
                        function initialize() 
                        {

                        }

                        //Place marker when location is clicked
                        function placeMarker(position, map)
                        {
                            var marker = new google.maps.Marker({
                            position: position,
                            map: map
                            });
                            map.panTo(position);
                        }
                        
                        //HTML5 API for reading file
                        function readDataFile()
                        {
                            // Check for the various File API support.
                            if (window.File && window.FileReader && window.FileList && window.Blob)
                            {
                                input = document.getElementById('fileinput');
                                if (!input.files)
                                {
                                    alert("This browser does not seem to support the `files` property of file inputs.");
                                }
                                else if (!input.files[0]) 
                                {
                                    alert("Please select a file before clicking");
                                }
                                else {
                                    file = input.files[0];
                                    fr = new FileReader();
                                    //Read file as text
                                    fr.readAsText(file);
                                    //Event for when file has loaded
                                    fr.onload = onLoadEventHandlerHTML5;
                                    //Event for the case of an error
                                    fr.error = errorEventHandlerHTML5;
                                    /*
                                    fr.onload = function(event)
                                    {            
                                        data = event.target.result;
                                        if(data != null)
                                            alert("File read successful.");
                                        else
                                            alert("File read failed. Null data.");
                                    }
                                    //Display read error
                                    fr.error = function(event)
                                    {            
                                        alert(event.target.error.name);
                                    }
                                    */
                                }

                            }
                            else
                            {
                                //try reading the files with activeX or with the XMLHttpRequest function
                                /*if(navigator.appName == "Microsoft Internet Explorer" && window.ActiveXObject)
                                {
                                    readFileActiveX();
                                }
                                else */if(window.XMLHttpRequest)
                                {
                                    readFileXMLHttp();
                                }
                                else
                                {
                                    alert('The File APIs are not fully supported by your browser.');
                                }
                            }
                        }
                        
                        //Event handler for the onload event in the FileReader HTML5 function 
                        function onLoadEventHandlerHTML5(evnt)
                        {
                            data = evnt.target.result;
                            if(data == null)
                                throw "Data file could not be read.";
                            else
                                processDataFile();
                        }
                        
                        //Event handler for the error event in the FileReader HTML5 function
                        function errorEventHandlerHTML5(evnt)
                        {
                            alert(evnt.target.error.name);
                        }
                        
                        //ActiveX file reading (Only for IE)
                        function readFileActiveX()
                        {
                            if (navigator.appName == "Microsoft Internet Explorer")
                            {
                                var fso, f;
                                fso = new ActiveXObject("Scripting.FileSystemObject");
                                f = fso.OpenTextFile("test.txt", 1, false, 0);
                                data = f.ReadAll();
                            }
                            else
                            {
                                alert('This browser is not supported. Please use Microsoft Internet Exploror');
                            }
                        }
                        
                        //XMLHttpRequest function used for reading file
                        function readFileXMLHttp()
                        {
                            var textFile
                            var allText;
                            //Try to instantiate a XMLHttp
                            try
                            {
                                textFile = new XMLHttpRequest();
                                textFile.onreadystatechange = onLoadEventHandlerXMLHttp;
                                textFile.open("GET", "file://C:/Users/JJD/Desktop/test.txt", true);
                            }
                            catch(e)
                            {
                                try
                                {
                                    textFile = new ActiveXObject("Msxml2.XMLHTTP");
                                    textFile.onreadystatechange = onLoadEventHandlerXMLHttp;
                                    textFile.open("GET", "file://C:/Users/JJD/Desktop/test.txt", true);
                                }
                                catch(e)
                                {
                                    try
                                    {
                                        textFile = new ActiveXObject("Microsoft.XMLHTTP");
                                        textFile.onreadystatechange = onLoadEventHandlerXMLHttp;
                                        textFile.open("GET", "file://C:/Users/JJD/Desktop/test.txt", true);
                                    }
                                    catch (e)
                                    {
                                        alert("This browser does not seem to support file reading.");
                                        return;
                                    }
                                }
                            }
                            //Event handler for the onload event in the XMLHttp function 
                            function onLoadEventHandlerXMLHttp()
                            {
                                if(textFile.readyState === 4 && textFile.status === 200) //Doc is ready to parse && the file is found
                                {
                                    allText = textFile.responseText;
                                    data = allText;
                                    processDataFile();
                                }
                                else
                                {
                                    alert("Data file could not be read.");
                                }
                            }
                        }
                        
                        //Display data in a popup window
                        function showData()
                        {
                            alert(data);
                        }
                        
                        //Process the data from the data file
                        function processDataFile()
                        {
                            //Split data rows of coordinats
                            var temp = data.split(";");
                            //Remove the last newline char
                            temp.splice(temp.length-1,1);
                            //Retrieve the timestep
                            simTimeStep = temp[0];
                            if(simTimeStep <= 0)
                                simTimeStep = 1000; //ms
                            temp.splice(0,1);
                            //Retrieve the number of vessels
                            numVessels = temp[0];
                            temp.splice(0,1);
                            //Retrieve the number of timesteps
                            numTimeSteps = temp.length;
                            currentTimeStep = 0;
                            //Store the data
                            data = temp;
                            //Start the simulation
                            simTimeStepEvent();
                        }
                        
                        //Extracts the coordinates of the vessels in the current time slice
                        function extractCurrentTimeStepData()
                        {
                            //Split data rows of coordinats
                            var n = data[currentTimeStep].split("\r\n");
                            size = n.length;
                            var m = new Array(size);
                            for(var i = 0; i<size; i++)
                            {
                                //Split data columns of coordinates and save as numbers
                                var temp = n[i].split(",");
                                m[i] = new Array(3);
                                //Coordinates
                                m[i][0] = Number(temp[0]);
                                m[i][1] = Number(temp[1]);
                                //vessel type
                                m[i][2] = Number(temp[2]);
                            }
                            timestepData = m;
                        }
                        
                        //Update the time step
                        function simTimeStepEvent()
                        {
                            if(currentTimeStep < numTimeSteps)
                            {
                                //Clear the screen of all markers
                                clearMarkers();
                                //Process new time step data and plot it
                                plotMarkers();
                                //Increment the time step
                                currentTimeStep++;
                                //Set the timeout for plotting the next timestep
                                window.setTimeout(simTimeStepEvent, simTimeStep);
                            }
                        }
                        
                        //Function to plot the data markers
                        function plotMarkers()
                        {
                            //Extract the current time steps data
                            extractCurrentTimeStepData();
                            markersArray = new Array(timestepData.length);
                            for(var i = 0; i<timestepData.length; i++)
                            {
                                var myLatLng = new google.maps.LatLng(timestepData[i][0], timestepData[i][1]);
                                if(timestepData[i][2] == 0) //transport vessel
                                {
                                    markersArray[i] = new google.maps.Marker({
                                            position: myLatLng,
                                            map: map,
                                            icon: shipIconTransport});
                                }
                                else if(timestepData[i][2] == 1) //fishing vessel
                                {
                                    markersArray[i] = new google.maps.Marker({
                                            position: myLatLng,
                                            map: map,
                                            icon: shipIconFishing});
                                }
                                else if(timestepData[i][2] == 2) //Pirate vessel
                                {
                                    markersArray[i] = new google.maps.Marker({
                                            position: myLatLng,
                                            map: map,
                                            icon: shipIconPirate});
                                }
                                else if(timestepData[i][2] == 3) //Hijacked vessel
                                {
                                    markersArray[i] = new google.maps.Marker({
                                            position: myLatLng,
                                            map: map,
                                            icon: shipIconHijacked});
                                }
                            }
                        }
                        
                        //Clear all markers on the map
                        function clearMarkers()
                        {
                            if(markersArray)
                            {
                                for (i in markersArray)
                                {
                                    markersArray[i].setMap(null);
                                }
                                markersArray.length = 0;
                            }
                        }
                        
                        //Reset the simulation
                        function restartSim()
                        {
                            if(data != null)
                            {
                                //Reset the current timestep to 0
                                currentTimeStep = 0;
                                //Start the simulation
                                simTimeStepEvent();
                            }
                            else
                            {
                                alert("No data file loaded. Please load a file.");
                            }
                        }

                    </script>
